name: Leovigildo
overview: The game is divided into three different blocks, one per chapter, which load independently and which you can play freely. There’s a four, last block containing the ending sequence. You need a password, given at the end of Chapter III, to access it. This wasn’t certainly Duke Benoit Rundown, heir of the great house of Salvalamalvadetierra’s finest moment. Unable to control his irrepressible fondness for watermelon peanuts, the Duke was squandering the fortune that the Salvalamalvadetierras had treasured for centuries since his ancestor Victor Alberto Saavedra discovered the legendary treasure of the African tribe the Jamacucos (province of Badajoz) and invested it all in a shipping company, a mining exploitation, and a dating agency.
